name: jumpmap
description: Interactive visualizaton of EVE jump locations.

scripts.process: > ./data/evesystems.ldj ; find ./data/sde/fsd/universe/eve -name 'solarsystem.staticdata' | grep -iv 'uua-f4' | grep -iv 'a821-a' | grep -iv 'j7hz-f' | xargs node ./maptool/process.js >> ./data/evesystems.ldj
